effect_entries.effect: Teaches Focus Punch to a compatible Pokémon.
effect_entries.short_effect: Teaches Hone Claws to a compatible Pokémon. (Gen IV & III: Focus Punch Gen II: DynamicPunch Gen I: Mega Punch)

flavor_text_entries.text:
つめを　磨いて　鋭く　する。
自分の　攻撃と
命中率を　あげる。

The user sharpens its claws to
boost its Attack stat and accuracy.

Chi la usa affila i propri artigli, aumentando
Attacco e precisione.

Quien lo usa invoca una fuerte lluvia que dura
cinco turnos y fortalece los movimientos de tipo
Agua.

Der Anwender wetzt seine Klauen, um sie zu
schärfen. Angriff und Genauigkeit werden erhöht.

Le lanceur s’aiguise les griffes.
Augmente l’Attaque et la Précision.

손톱을 갈아 날카롭게 만든다.
자신의 공격과
명중률을 올린다.

つめを　みがいて　するどく　する。
じぶんの　こうげきと
めいちゅうりつを　あげる。

The user focuses its mind before
launching this attack. It will fail if
the user is hit before it is used.

launching this attack. It will fail if

An attack that is
executed last.
The user flinches
if hit beforehand.

the user flinch if
hit by the foe.
